name: Sengoku Basara 2 Heroes
description: Sengoku Basara 2: Heroes is a follow-up to Sengoku Basara 2 which adds numerous new features and content. Most notably, the Conquest mode can be played by two players simultaneously, either cooperatively or head-to-head. Additionally, every enemy general from the previous release is now fully-playable, bringing the playable roster to 30 characters in total.
